channel.title: [RESOLVED] Notice. My account got locked in regards to replies on the fourm
channel.description:
What happened: I can't post anymore? It said I reached my limit on post and should wait another 24 hours before posting again.
What was SUPPOSED to happen: Did not know this was a thing, I guess it's to help people spaming the forums which I understand but I was having a good conversation about an idea and usually after 24 hours the conversation is dead and hard to start back up again
Steps to reproduce this issue:
1. Create an account 2. Interact with others until you get notifications about not being able to post anymore until the next day 3. FeelsBadMan

item.title: [RESOLVED] Notice. My account got locked in regards to replies on the fourm
item.dc:creator: Aurelia
item.description:
You simply have to wait 24 hours, then you can start again. You’re not locked, or banned. Just time-out to prevent any new account from spamming the forum

Read full topic

item.description:
What happened:
I can’t post anymore? It said I reached my limit on post and should wait another 24 hours before posting again.

What was SUPPOSED to happen:
Did not know this was a thing, I guess it’s to help people spaming the forums which I understand but I was having a good conversation about an idea and usually after 24 hours the conversation is dead and hard to start back up again

Steps to reproduce this issue:

  1. Create an account
  2. Interact with others until you get notifications about not being able to post anymore until the next day
  3. FeelsBadMan
